Class NetPositions

  • java.lang.Object
    • NetPositions

  • public class NetPositions
extends java.lang.Object
    NetPositions class This class stores the list of all the positions which the client has accumulated through the trading day.

    Note:- The trades which happened before the connection was made can be replayed back from the server and this class will then be able to provide the net positions for the day.
